ygData.subject: Re: Newbie questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... A lot of people never bothered with Pixie Strike because it s targeted.  That means you either have to be very good at switching which mob you ve targeted,
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 27 Oct 1999, Bobby wrote:
>
> Question: I just got Pixie strike and was looking forward mostly to its
> spell interupting ability, which seems to work really well. I being 28th now
> grouped with a 40th bard who was lookign for the mudwater rune. He stated he
> keeps Lucid lull or Lament armed for spell interuption. Thats the question
> does the target or area lull songs interupt spells extremely well.

A lot of people never bothered with Pixie Strike because it's
targeted. That means you either have to be very good at
switching which mob you've targeted, or you keep one mob
targeted and don't use your weapons (attack). I know a lot of
bards just use Lullaby instead to avoid the targeting hassle.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
